content:
🔥 **Yes, adding a line about the post gaining traction will increase credibility and FOMO.**  

📌 **Where to insert it?**  
- **Right before the "Just posted a breakdown" line** in each message.  
- This way, they see that **others are already engaging**, making them more likely to check it out.  

---

### **🔥 New Line to Insert**  
📌 **Insert this before the "Just posted a breakdown" sentence:**  

> **The post is already gaining traction—seems like it’s really resonating with people.**  

**Example (Using Steve Nouri's Message):**  

> **Hey Steve,**  
> Your insights on AI's impact on hiring are 🔥—and I’m putting it to the test.  
>  
> I’m running a live experiment showing how AI is already eliminating white-collar jobs **before hiring models can adapt.**  
>  
> Would love your take—especially on **how companies should rethink hiring in this new era.**  
>  
> **The post is already gaining traction—seems like it’s really resonating with people.**  
>  
> Just posted an AI-driven breakdown—keen to hear your thoughts!  
>  
> [Insert LinkedIn Post Link]  
>  
> Appreciate your work & would love to connect!  

---

📌 **Update all messages with this line & send!**  
✅ Follow them on X.  
✅ Let me know once you send so we can track responses! 🚀
